Actions.Text: REFERRED TO INVESTIGATIONS AND GOVERNMENT OPERATIONS

Title: Enacts the "responsible alcohol education act"
Summary: Enacts the responsible alcohol education act; establishes on-premise liquor licenses for certified educators of alcoholic beverage instructional courses and special permits for registered lecturers to conduct these courses.
ActClause: AN ACT to amend the alcoholic beverage control law, in relation to establishing on-premise liquor licenses for certified educators of alcoholic beverage instructional courses, establishing special permits for registered lecturers to conduct these courses, and establishing the "responsible alcohol education act"
